data.text:
I'm coming in. 
Yahoo, Trainer-san, how're you doing?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>I'm coming in. 
<story>Yahoo, Trainer-san, how're you doing?

data.text:
I see, well I'm glad to hear that. After all, being 
happy and healthy is the most important thing, 
whether you're a human or an Uma Musume.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>I see, well I'm glad to hear that. After all, being 
<story>happy and healthy is the most important thing, 
<story>whether you're a human or an Uma Musume.

data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
Seiun Sky's gaze continued to wander. 
It seemed like something was bothering her.
data.processed:
<story>Seiun Sky's gaze continued to wander. 
<story>It seemed like something was bothering her.

data.text:
She didn't seem like she was doing well… 
So I said…

choices.text: Let's go out for a change.

data.processed:
<story>She didn't seem like she was doing well… 
<story>So I said…

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Eh…?

data.text:
Oh, now isn't this rare. Trainer-san, are you telling me that 
you're trying to skip out on work?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Oh, now isn't this rare. Trainer-san, are you telling me that 
<story>you're trying to skip out on work?

data.text:
Well isn't that nice, so what're we gonna do? 
Sunbathe? Look for cats? Or how about… fishing?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Well isn't that nice, so what're we gonna do? 
<story>Sunbathe? Look for cats? Or how about… fishing?

data.text: And so, Seiun Sky and I went fishing, but…
data.processed: <story>And so, Seiun Sky and I went fishing, but…
<story>…

data.text:
Ahaha! Trainer-san, you're pretty bad at this, aren't you? 
Although I ended up skunked too. Nyahaha.
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: Still having fun with no catches?
Still having fun with no catches?

data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! Trainer-san, you're pretty bad at this, aren't you? 
<story>Although I ended up skunked too. Nyahaha.

data.text:
He he he, you can tell? 
Can you really tell?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>He he he, you can tell? 
<story>Can you really tell?

data.text:
Well I'll give you a piece of advice for that. 
"Love fishing more than the fish."
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Well I'll give you a piece of advice for that. 
<story>"Love fishing more than the fish."

data.text:
Getting a catch isn't what's important after all. 
It's how you fish that truly matters.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Getting a catch isn't what's important after all. 
<story>It's how you fish that truly matters.

data.text:
Swinging your rod around blindly won't work. Immediately pulling 
it up when you feel a fish won't work either. That's why you 
need to continue trying new methods until something sticks.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Swinging your rod around blindly won't work. Immediately pulling 
<story>it up when you feel a fish won't work either. That's why you 
<story>need to continue trying new methods until something sticks.

data.text:
Simply put, you aim for your target, collect information, 
prepare, then try. And if that doesn't work, you 
change it up and try again.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Simply put, you aim for your target, collect information, 
<story>prepare, then try. And if that doesn't work, you 
<story>change it up and try again.

data.text:
There's no better feeling than when the trap 
that you've been preparing finally catches its prey.
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: Sounds like the way you race.
Sounds like the way you race.

data.processed:
<story>There's no better feeling than when the trap 
<story>that you've been preparing finally catches its prey.

data.text: Eh…? What part?
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: Using different tactics to ensure victory.

data.processed: <story>Eh…? What part?

data.text: What's this…?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>What's this…?

data.text:
Now now, I have no idea what you mean. You probably already know 
this, but I'm not that great of an Uma Musume.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Now now, I have no idea what you mean. You probably already know 
<story>this, but I'm not that great of an Uma Musume.

data.text:
I'm not the child of a GI Uma Musume and my grades 
in school aren't great. So why would someone like 
me have any aspirations to win?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>I'm not the child of a GI Uma Musume and my grades 
<story>in school aren't great. So why would someone like 
<story>me have any aspirations to win?

data.text:
That's why I don't expect anything of myself, I just 
take it easy and spend most of my days relaxing and 
fishing. That's the life of Sei-chan.
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: But you still want to be first, right?
But you still want to be first, right?

data.processed:
<story>That's why I don't expect anything of myself, I just 
<story>take it easy and spend most of my days relaxing and 
<story>fishing. That's the life of Sei-chan.

data.text: What's this…?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>What's this…?

data.text:
Ohoho… This is odd… 
Are you really my trainer?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Ohoho… This is odd… 
<story>Are you really my trainer?

data.text:
The same trainer that's a rookie, went with the flow, 
and accepted my excuses, no matter how irresponsible they were?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>The same trainer that's a rookie, went with the flow, 
<story>and accepted my excuses, no matter how irresponsible they were?

data.text:
Don't tell me, did something come out 
of the river and replace you? How scary…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Don't tell me, did something come out 
<story>of the river and replace you? How scary…

data.text:
I guess you really are my trainer… 
Then why are you…?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>I guess you really are my trainer… 
<story>Then why are you…?

data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
Hey Trainer-san… 
Do people tell you that you're really cunning?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Hey Trainer-san… 
<story>Do people tell you that you're really cunning?

data.text:
We then spent some time 
together fishing in complete silence.
data.processed:
<story>We then spent some time 
<story>together fishing in complete silence.

data.text: And then…
data.processed: <story>And then…

data.text:
You know… you really do get me. 
I have those moments too…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>You know… you really do get me. 
<story>I have those moments too…

data.text:
For example, thinking that I wasn't good enough to have the same 
innocent dreams that the others have, and that my body really 
isn't what it used to be…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>For example, thinking that I wasn't good enough to have the same 
<story>innocent dreams that the others have, and that my body really 
<story>isn't what it used to be…

data.text:
Yet because of those thoughts… I figured 
it'd be too boring for me to let go of the rod.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Yet because of those thoughts… I figured 
<story>it'd be too boring for me to let go of the rod.

data.text:
So I studied, thought, thought even more, 
prepared, planned, and set my trap…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>So I studied, thought, thought even more, 
<story>prepared, planned, and set my trap…

data.text:
And then I finally caught it. A huge catch 
that was bigger than anyone could imagine!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>And then I finally caught it. A huge catch 
<story>that was bigger than anyone could imagine!

data.text:
It was so amazing! The greatest feeling I've ever had!! It left 
everyone around me with their jaws on the floor!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>It was so amazing! The greatest feeling I've ever had!! It left 
<story>everyone around me with their jaws on the floor!

data.text:
"Why'd it have to be her" "How in the world 
did she!?" "There should be no way someone 
could catch something like that, yet…!"
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: So that's how this all began?
So that's how this all began?

data.processed:
<story>"Why'd it have to be her" "How in the world 
<story>did she!?" "There should be no way someone 
<story>could catch something like that, yet…!"

data.text: It really does bother me…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>It really does bother me…

data.text:
I'm lazy and all I want to do is relax, that's a fact. I'm not 
interested in being "hot-blooded," having a lot of "guts," or 
putting in tons of "hard work"…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>I'm lazy and all I want to do is relax, that's a fact. I'm not 
<story>interested in being "hot-blooded," having a lot of "guts," or 
<story>putting in tons of "hard work"…

data.text:
And that's why it bothers me… 
How I felt in that moment is etched into my mind.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>And that's why it bothers me… 
<story>How I felt in that moment is etched into my mind.

data.text:
But of course… 
This is all referring to fishing.
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: Let's fish up a huge catch together

<story>But of course… 
<story>This is all referring to fishing.

data.text: Trainer-san…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san…

data.text:
What's this…? 
It seems like you've activated Sei-chan's whimsical mode.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>What's this…? 
<story>It seems like you've activated Sei-chan's whimsical mode.

data.text:
Anyways, Trainer-san, why don't we head to 
the training course? I kinda wanna go for a run.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Anyways, Trainer-san, why don't we head to 
<story>the training course? I kinda wanna go for a run.

data.text:
And it's definitely not because I thought that getting some 
advice from an actual trainer would be nice for a change!!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>And it's definitely not because I thought that getting some 
<story>advice from an actual trainer would be nice for a change!!

data.text:
Just kidding… I wanted to try out being a tsundere this time, 
so what'd you think? Was it cute? Teehee ☆
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Just kidding… I wanted to try out being a tsundere this time, 
<story>so what'd you think? Was it cute? Teehee ☆

data.text: Eh!? Wai―
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Eh!? Wai―

data.text:
Trainer-san… 
I need you to train yourself to not take my jokes so seriously…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san… 
<story>I need you to train yourself to not take my jokes so seriously…

data.text:
I'm begging you. You're gonna need 
it if we're gonna mesh well together.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>I'm begging you. You're gonna need 
<story>it if we're gonna mesh well together.

data.text:
Cause after all, we're gonna catch 
something truly amazing together.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Cause after all, we're gonna catch 
<story>something truly amazing together.

data.text:
And with that, Seiun Sky and 
I had our first training session together.
data.processed:
<story>And with that, Seiun Sky and 
<story>I had our first training session together.

title: Hanging a Fishing Line From the Sky
